mapper.insert: INSERT INTO club (club_title, club_create_time, club_info, club_master_id, club_master_nm, club_member) VALUES(#{club_title}, now(), #{club_info}, #{club_master_id}, #{club_master_nm}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM club WHERE true

SELECT club_title, club_info, club_master_id, club_master_nm, club_create_time, club_id FROM club WHERE true
order by club_create_time desc, club_id desc limit #{pageSize} offset #{offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO club_board (club_article_title, club_article_content, club_board_upload_time, club_article_viewcnt, club_id, user_id) VALUES(#{club_article_title}, #{club_article_content}, now(), 0, #{club_id}, #{user_id})

choose.otherwise: AND (club_article_title LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR club_article_content LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'))

mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM club_board WHERE true

SELECT club_article_id, club_article_title, club_article_content, club_board_upload_time, club_article_viewcnt, club_id, user_id FROM club_board WHERE true
order by club_board_upload_time desc, club_article_id desc limit #{pageSize} offset #{offset}
